prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with metallic armor and fierce red eyes.
Show me a sturdy steel-type Pokemon that resembles an insect but has a unique twist.
Generate a Pokemon that combines the traits of an ant and a machine.
Imagine a Pokemon with a tough exterior and a strategic mind for battles.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a strong defense.
Make a Pokemon that uses its agility and strength to outmaneuver opponents.
Give me a visually striking Pokemon that embodies the essence of teamwork.
